value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|"Day of Devotion?" Whatever is that?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|It's a festival! If there's someone you
really care about, you can give them
a present packed with your feelings...$k$pAnd if you have a special someone in
mind... You can confess your feelings
there, too.$k$pI'm so excited!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I always find it fascinating to hear
about the social rituals of today's
youth...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, Alfonse. "Today's youth?"$k$pYou do realize that, today, you— No,
never mind. Not this conversation
again...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Right! What we really should be talking
about is profits. Festivals like this one
cannot be underestimated.$k$pWhy? Because you can sell candy.
So much candy. Mounds of candy...
Mountains of candy...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You're even worse! You're draining
every drop of romance out of the Day
of Devotion...$k$p$EFace|I despair to listen to the both of
you! Let's hurry on our way before
you ruin everything!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_愛の祭リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Valentine18,Face|Oh, Roy, look! That shop sells pegasi
sculpted from sugar. How adorable!$k$pAnd over there—that one sells candy
colored in every shade under the sun!
How lovely.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Valentine18,Face|It sure is something! I think there's
more candy than I ever could have
imagined here...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Valentine18,Face|Roy... If somebody was going to get
you a present, what kind of present
would you like?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Valentine18,Face|Hmm... Anything's fine! Just the fact
that somebody is thinking about me
makes me happy.$k$pWhat I'm more worried about is the
tournament. We need to prepare!$k$pMy father and Lord Hector will be
there too, and I want to make sure
not to disappoint them.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Valentine18,Face|Oh, Roy... Wouldn't you rather enjoy
the festival instead? I would.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_愛の祭リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Valentine18,Face|Oh, no! The present...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Valentine18,Face|Lilina, are you all right? Don't worry!
I'll grab the present. You just worry
about retreating for now...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Valentine18,Face|Thank you, Roy.$k$p$Sbs150|
